column1: Smoque BBQ////I love Smoque! I've been here twice and the 1st time I had the St Louis ribs meal half rack w Mac n cheese and cornbread. Â So good! Mouth watering! The 2nd time I had the baby back half rack w max n cheese and cornbread again. Both were fantastic but the St Louis was INSANE! Delicious Mac n cheese and awesome cornbread. And the portions are big!
